News
2004-09-28Improved support for .NETCF and added MessageBoxAppender. Also added the new .NETCF binary snapshot. You can get the new version from the snapshots directory.
2004-09-02Added preliminary support for database logging. It's available in SVN repository or in the snapshots.
2004-08-30NLog 0.2 beta 1 has been released!. This is the initial public release and includes source and binary package plus a Win32-based graphical installer which is a one-click way to install NLog for use with VS.NET. Download it here.
2004-08-26Added OutputDebugString appender.
2004-08-25First API stabilization attempt. Introduced typed collection for almost all public properties. The logging interface is now clean and very unlikely to change in the future. Programmatic configuration API may see some revisions, but don't expect them to be major.
2004-08-23Initial support for MDC and NDC is in SVN. See this post for more information. Website will be updated soon to reflect MDC/NDC support.
2004-08-23Initial support for filter infrastructure added to SVN repository. NLog core is feature complete now. Future work will concentrate on stabilizing things and adding new appenders, layout appenders and filters.
2004-08-21Public announcement of the NLog project.
